lom:description.lom:string: "The poster presents institutional characteristics that can statistically predict the proportion of female computer science bachelors' degrees conferred at institutions. School or college (e.g., engineering) has little predictive power in this model."

lom:keyword.lom:string: Gender Equity, Classroom climate, Faculty development, Pair programming, Stereotype threat, Peer-led team learning, Recruitment, Retention

lom:title.lom:string: The effect of institutional characteristics on participation of women in computer science bachelors degree programs
